Origin: | Turkish |- ! Meaning: | Ember Moon | |- ! Related Names: | |} Koray is a common Turkish given name. It is composed of "Kor" and "Ay". In Turkish "Kor" means "Ember" and "Ay" means "Moon". Thus, "Koray" means "a moon in the colour of ember". == Given name == * Koray Ariş. Turkish sculptor * Koray Arslan, Turkish footballer * Koray Avcı, Turkish footballer * Koray Candemir, Turkish musician * Koray Günter, German-Turkish footballer * Koray Şanlı, Turkish footballer == Surname == * Erkin Koray, Turkish rock musician Category:Turkish masculine given names Category:Turkish- language surnames
title: Koray
